name: Gigabyte GM-M8600 Wireless Laser Mouse
Features: [GamePlay Wireless Technology- over 50hrs battery life in game play, Quick-swap battery system- instant battery changing under 2secs, as fast as gun clip loading, 32KB onboard memory enables up to 5 programmable profile settings, Dual mode wired / wireless functionality-switch between the wireless freedom and the frenzy of wired play, Advanced GHOST Macro Engine]
